mapper.insert: insert into pds(title, userid, views, thumbup, contents, fname1, fname2, fname3, fsize1, fsize2, fsize3, ftype1, ftype2, ftype3, uuid) values (#{title}, #{userid}, #{views}, #{thumbup}, #{contents},#{fname1}, #{fname2}, #{fname3}, #{fsize1}, #{fsize2}, #{fsize3},#{ftype1}, #{ftype2}, #{ftype3}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select pno, title, userid, regdate, views, thumbup from pds order by pno desc limit #{snum}, 30;
